metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19827 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In LibSass 3.5.5, a use-after-free vulnerability exists in the SharedPtr class in SharedPtr.cpp (or SharedPtr.hpp) that may cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: libsass package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.5-4').
